text: Chisimu twaatumisye Achimitenga Wetu ni ilosyo yakuonechela, ni twatumisye pampepe ni wanganyao chitabu kwisa soni chilungamiko, kuti wandu ajime (pakutendelana ichindu yao) mwachilungamiko, ni tutulwisye chisyano, mwalakwemo mwana machili gamajinji (gakuputila ngondo), kwisa soni yakwakamuchisya wandu (yakulekangana-lekangana), soni kuti Allah ammanyukule mundu jwaakunkamuchisya Jwalakwe (paajikamuchisya dini Jakwe), ni (kwakamuchisya) Achimitenga Wakwe mwangali kumâ€™bona (Allah jo). Chisimu Allah ni Jwakulimbangana nnope, Jwamachili gakupunda
